name: OnTrailerUpdate
warnings: This callback is called very frequently per second per trailer. You should refrain from implementing intensive calculations or intensive file writing/reading operations in this callback.
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3z R4 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a player sent a trailer update.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player who sent a trailer update

return_values:
0 - Cancels any trailer updates from being sent to other players. Update is still sent to the updating player.

 1 - Processes the trailer update as normal and synchronizes it between all players.

 It is always called first in filterscripts.
